pr_title: Remove few tests from acceptance tag

timeline.message:
Remove few tests from acceptance profile

Signed-off-by: Jakub Stejskal <xstejs24@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: It looks to me like after removing this from acceptance, we will have for external listeners only LoadBalancer and Route tests => but non of these would run on Azure. So ... Maybe we could keep this to run on Azure? (and perhaps remove the load balancer one since I guess in reality that one doesn't run anywhere?
timeline.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: NodePort test with acceptance tag is here https://github.com/strimzi/strimzi-kafka-operator/blob/master/systemtest/src/test/java/io/strimzi/systemtest/kafka/listeners/MultipleListenersST.java#L70
replies.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText: Ok, in that case we do not need it. I missed that one.
replies.author: scholzj
